name: memphis
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a large city on the Mississippi river in the southeastern US state of Tennessee: She decided to move from Memphis to Florida. He owns a team in Memphis.
More examplesFewer examplesThe NBA is going to make Memphis a world-class city.Elvis Presley recorded his first single, "That's All Right," at Memphis, Tennessee's Sun Studio.
